ClassDesc: Represents an operation that accepts an object-valued and a long-valued argument, and returns no result. This is the (reference, long) specialization of @B_java#util#function#BiConsumer_E@. Unlike most other functional interfaces, ObjLongConsumer is expected to operate via side-effects. This is a @B_java#util#function#ObjLongConsumer#accept_E@.
